__TOC__

UbuCat is the official IRC Bot of the <nowiki>[[CatalanTeam|Catalan LoCo Team]]</nowiki> that you can find in at the channel #ubuntu-cat on Freenode; it works mainly with PHP and MySQL (build upon <nowiki>[[http://www.kore-nordmann.de/home/k_bot|k.bot]]</nowiki>).

You can find more information about it, in Catalan, on <nowiki>[[CatalanTeam/IRC/Bot|its wiki page]]</nowiki>.
